description:
SoccerDie: Cosmic Cup is a love-letter to classic arcade and bullet hell titles that features the most accurate soccer simulation specifically created to support land mines, giant brains, stompy dinos, colorful ghosts, unreasonable tanks, and at least one vampire.  
 
WIN AND YOUR PLANET BECOME FREEDOM!
 • “Kick to Soccer” – 9 foot-bruising rounds of solo action across 5 fields, 20+ enemies and 5 alien bosses
• "You are Earth’s Only Hope” - Choose between 8 different soccer superstars 
• “2-Player Coop” - Grab a friend and pass to victory with a coop SoccerDie playthrough. 
• “Speed Run Timer” - Time your run in the name of speed (and bragging rights)
• “B-b-b-bonus Levels” - Unlock bonus stages and randomized levels as (if) you progress
name: SoccerDie: Cosmic Cup
